recipe_name: Easy Kids' Recipe for Fluffy Banana Cookies
ingredients: 2  ripe bananas, mashed, or more to taste, 1   +   1/2 cups all-purpose flour,   +   1/2 cup white sugar, or more to taste,   +   1/4 cup butter, melted,   +   1/4 cup chopped walnuts (Optional), 1  egg, 1 teaspoon baking soda,   +   1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 tablespoon white sugar
nutrition: Total Fat 6g 8%, Saturated Fat 3g 14%, Cholesterol 24mg 8%, Sodium 186mg 8%, Total Carbohydrate 26g 10%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 12g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 2mg 9%, Calcium 9mg 1%, Iron 1mg 5%, Potassium 104mg 2%
